promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic gorilla steel-type pokemon wearing white armor. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Desertitan, a a gigantic basic gorilla steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Rotating Claws, Twilight Inspiration. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "steel" or "Desertitan". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, gorilla-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Desert giants with rotating claws, these colossal simians thrive in arid habitats, harnessing twilight energy for unmatched desert protection.
